attributes.action: Remove the calorie labelling rule on menus.
attributes.additional_details: There are many individuals who suffer with eating disorders. It is extremely triggering to see calories on menus at every food or drink venue, which can worsen their condition and even set these individuals back in their recovery.
attributes.background: Remove the calorie labelling rule for food and drink venues, and provide the option of a regular menu OR calorie labelled menu, for those suffering with eating disorders.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614396
